TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Okay, but everyone also forgets the few good parts of the prequels (lightsaber duels, space battles, Mace Windu, etc.) as well.

I wish today was Friday

Granted. Today is suddenly Friday, but since stock markets, clocks and other things are not prepared for the sudden change in day, they all crash, leaving humanity in a stone-age society once again.

I wish for some KNO3.

Granted. You light a match and find yourself inside a gunpowder storage. Suddenly you sneeze...

I wish Philae wake up and climb out from the pit where it has fallen.

Granted, but Philae got taken over by the aliens and is now manipulating satellites so every TV station on Earth is just showing "Painting with Bob Ross" 24/7.

I wish Donald Trump is transforming into a cat...

Granted, but he's a bloodthirsty lion who can speak English

I wish I worked at Rooster Teeth

Granted. You are CABOOSE THE VEHICLE DESTROYER!!!! Nothing else.

I wish I didn't need to go to school.

Granted. You now have no job and you're homeless.
I wish I could talk like Burnie Burns, Gus Sorola, Geoff Ramsey, and Joel Heyman

Granted, you can talk like them. But due to a ****ing ****up by a ****ing idiot ****ing genie ****er, you do ****ing talk like ****ing Gordon ****ing Ramsay.

I wish swearing was allowed on the KSP forums.

(I Said Geoff Ramsey, not Gordon)
Granted, but non-swear words become illegal IRL

I wish Shia Labeouf was an actual cannibal

Granted. He eats you.

I wish I didn't have to run cross country.

Not granted. Cross Country is great!

 

I wish the kraken would leave my stories aone.

Granted, but he corrupts all of your save files.
I wish that the old Star Wars canon was still canon (Books, games, etc.)

Granted. That pretty much corrupts itself with some of the crazy stuff that was in the EU. Star Wars Episode VII is a fifteen minute animated short where Starkiller Base gets destroyed by a Sun Crusher.

I wish I'd written down the chess game I just played.

Granted, but you write it on a super important exam and it causes you to fail.

I wish I was a Jedi.

Granted. There are 29 more young jedi's lying on the bloody floor around Anakin.

I wish the X-wing have two more cannons aside.

Granted! They are installed in place of the shields.

I wish for a 20-kerbal Size 3 mothership-class command pod in the next update.

Granted. but it crashes your computer.

 

I wish that my title wasn't a clear reference to something.

Granted, now it's a clear reference to everything

I wish RvB season 15 would BE A THING ALREADY!

Granted. Caboose dies.

I wish for an unlimited data plan.

Granted. You didn't read the contract and gave your soul to the company who had the contract.

I wish for all of the KSP installs of the next poster would be deleted.

Granted, you blooming nuisance. Now I have to restore from my backups.

I wish rlin would go fly a kite.

Granted, but the kite is on Mars and nothing very exciting happens.

I wish all teachers would embrace our technological resources and teach us to make good use of them instead of dismissing them as "cheating" and giving us lots of busywork.

Edited September 8, 2016 by cubinator

Granted, but an EMP destroys all electronics on Earth. Shame.

I wish to win life.

Granted, but your the only one playing on the board. Your the only one ever.

I wish that Arena Closers in diep.io didn't exist.

Granted, by getting rid of the entire .io TLD and every site under it including diep.io.

I wish a single nice cup of tea would make itself in my kitchen.
